revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: A system of oratory, delivered in a course of lectures publicly read at Gresham College, London. To which is prefixed an inaugural oration, spoken in Latin... / by J..."
revision.text: Possibly: A system of oratory, delivered in a course of lectures publicly read at Gresham College, London. To which is prefixed an inaugural oration, spoken in Latin... / by John Ward... [In two volumes]. (London : Printed for John Ward, 1759). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1303969~S1
